snippet: British lawmakers focused on footwear Monday, asking whether employers should be able to make women wear high heels as part of a corporate dress code....

headline.main: Are High Heel Dress Codes Sexist? UK Lawmakers Hold Debate
headline.print_headline: Are High Heel Dress Codes Sexist? UK Lawmakers Hold Debate

lead_paragraph: British lawmakers focused on footwear Monday, asking whether employers should be able to make women wear high heels as part of a corporate dress code.
